product_name: Columbia Sur Le Peak II Insulated Pants - Women's
long_description: Wiaterproof and insulated, the Columbia Sur Le Peak(TM) II pants ensure you stay warm, dry and protected during big ski days and snowshoe trips in cold winter weather. Omni-Tech(R) waterproof, breathable nylon shell resists abrasion and breathes well; seams are fully sealed to keep moisture from getting in. Lofty polyester insulation keeps cold temps away. Zippered cargo pockets. Internal adjustable gaiters keep snow from getting into your ski boots. Columbia Sur Le Peak II pants have an active fit.
short_description: Wiaterproof and insulated, the Columbia Sur Le Peak(TM) II pants ensure you stay warm, dry and protected during big ski days and snowshoe trips in cold winter weather.
